function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Occupants not feeling comfortable or feeling ill in the building","Impact":"Decreased productivity and well-being, potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Regular feedback collection from occupants, prompt follow-up on reported feelings of illness","Technologies":"HVAC system inspection and maintenance, air duct cleaning","People":"Occupants of the building","Owner":"Building management and maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Failure to meet cleaning standards for HVAC systems","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality, potential spread of contagious diseases, low energy efficiency","Mitigation":"Adherence to ANSI/ASHRAE Standard 180-2018 and NADCA ACR 2013 standards, use of certified cleaning firms","Technologies":"HVAC system cleaning equipment, ACR 2013 standards","People":"HVAC system cleaning contractors","Owner":"Building management and maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Non-compliance with state regulations for air duct cleaners","Impact":"Legal repercussions, potential subpar cleaning of HVAC system","Mitigation":"Verification of required licenses for air duct cleaners, compliance with state regulations","Technologies":"Verification of licenses and certifications, compliance tracking systems","People":"HVAC system cleaning contractors, building management","Owner":"Building management and maintenance staff"}]}
